modName: PSS - Project Solar Systems - Vanilla Only
summary: Up For Discussions & Ideas, for now.
descriptionHtml:
Simply making large maps with rivers and mountains, forests and islands, new factions, class\'s and powerful npc\'s and equipment, for each planet, then connecting them.

2 Solar systems so far, 1st has 5 planets and the 2nd has 4, each planet has its own environment types, like a water planet with only a few or more small islands that connect through underground tunnels and many underground places like \"DarkReach\" or \"BlackReach\", w/e its called.
Also Jungle, Desert, Arctic, Wastelands, Normal Grass fields and forest Type environments and planets with alittle bet of everything, like the first planet.
Plus!, Each planet has 1 or more moons! to travel to.

Im making a way to SS1-P1, 1st Solar System - 1st planet, a gate at the end of \"The lost Temple Path\", it starts at a small beaten up tower called \"Cradle Stone Tower\", its the tower at the top of \"Lost Valley redoubt\", passed the word of power/two hagravens, at the top of the tower there is a trap door that leads down to a basement with a hole in the wall leading down a tunnel that ends up being a hole, jump down the hole to \"The Mirrored Tower\" roof(Tower Entrance), the tower has 7 floors/areas, 1-Roof, 2-Main Hall, 3-Market, 4-Housing(Hotel), 5-Engine Room, 6-Dig Site, 7-Temple Approach.
The one picture is not exact, cuzz i changed alot.
